Qieyun: 見開三欣平?, 見開三欣去?
English: an adze; a hatchet. the Chinese "catty" or pound

Qieyun: 崇開二咸平?, 初開二銜平?
English: to mix; to blend. to support
a large branch of the Yang-tzu; name of a famous dynasty; hence of, or belonging to, China

Qieyun: 日開三鹽平?, 日開三鹽上?

English: the name of a disciple of Confucius
the name of a small state in which Mencius was born

Qieyun: 以開三魚平?, 以開三魚去?

English: to drive a chariot; to manage; to control. imperial
to take the reins of government; to occupy the throne
